Text: you're welcome NEL117. by the way, riverchase requested this series, not binderguy1. i'm still working on coyote, binderguy1!

Good Lord, man!  I don't know how you manage to sleep?!? 

Thanks for the ul!

The reading list almost reminds me of the Revised Chronological X-Men that the H33T website carries.  Talk about listing every single X-men related title and appearance in existence.
(up to just after Civil War)

Yes it is quite a source! It's wonderful that pages like that exist, created just for the love of something -- and often that something is nerdy.

Speaking of which, this was accidentally timely of me to post, as I just read a few moments ago that Jennifer Lawrence (Mystique in both the latest and next X-Men films) won the Best Actress Academy Award! And recovered nicely from falling on her face!
